commands.channelbound: Successfully bound the Yorkle bot to the {channel} channel.
commands.content.description: Gets a summary of the content known by Yorkle
commands.guess.description: Guess the song from the clip provided
commands.judgement.description: Seek judgement from the Judge, Jury, and Executioner.
commands.newgame.description: Play a game of Yorkle - the ultimate Yorkiverse guessing game
commands.randomlyric.description: Replies with a random song lyric
commands.setgamechannel.channel: The channel for the bot to share results to
commands.setgamechannel.description: Sets the channel for the bot to share results to
commands.share.description: Share your results for today's Yorkle
commands.skip.description: Skip the current clip to guess on a longer one
commands.version.description: Gets the version of Yorkle the bot is running on
commands.whennext.description: Calculates the time remaining until the next puzzle
commands.whennext.response: The next Yorkle will be available {timestamp}.
